scan_metadata.description: ssm - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks SSM document for secret management settings
Code Executable - Checks if SSM documents are public
check_functions.description: Ensures SSM documents are not publicly accessible

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks SSM managed patch compliance
check_functions.description: Verifies patch compliance for managed instances

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors AWS CLI version for upgrades
check_functions.description: Checks if AWS CLI is up to date

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors patch compliance status
check_functions.description: Monitors patch compliance status of instances

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks patch baseline compliance
check_functions.description: Validates patch baseline compliance for SSM

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors OS patch and update status
check_functions.description: Checks workstation OS patch and update status

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors FSx Lustre client installation
check_functions.description: Checks FSx Lustre client installation status
Checks endpoint detection and response functionality
